Uses of Package
org.jsapar.error

  • Packages that use org.jsapar.error 
    Package Description
    org.jsapar
    The JSaPar package provides a parser for flat and CSV (Comma Separated Values) files.
    org.jsapar.compose
    Classes for converting an Document or a Line into an output.
    org.jsapar.compose.bean
    Classes for composing Java Beans as output.
    org.jsapar.compose.string
    Classes for composing a stream of Java String as output for each line.
    org.jsapar.concurrent
    Can be used to add concurrency.
    org.jsapar.convert
    Classes that supports converting an input such as a file or stream in one format and write it to an other output in an other format.
    org.jsapar.error
    Error handling and exceptions
    org.jsapar.parse
    For reading input and building the canonical data model described in the org.jsapar.model package.
    org.jsapar.parse.bean
    Internal classes for creating line parsed event based on Java beans.
    org.jsapar.parse.csv
    Internal classes for parsing comma or delimiter separated values (CSV) text sources.
    org.jsapar.parse.fixed
    Internal classes for parsing fixed width text sources.
    org.jsapar.parse.text  
    org.jsapar.parse.xml
    Parsing of xml input.
  • Classes in org.jsapar.error used by org.jsapar 
    Class and Description
    ErrorEventListener
    Interface for receiving event call-backs while parsing or composing.
  • Classes in org.jsapar.error used by org.jsapar.compose 
    Class and Description
    ErrorEventListener
    Interface for receiving event call-backs while parsing or composing.
    JSaParException
    Base class for all types of errors that can be added to an ErrorEvent
    ValidationAction
    Enum describing different actions to take upon validation.
  • Classes in org.jsapar.error used by org.jsapar.compose.bean 
    Class and Description
    ErrorEvent
    The event that is fired in any of the implementations of ParseTask, Composer or ConvertTask in case an error occured.
    ErrorEventListener
    Interface for receiving event call-backs while parsing or composing.
    ValidationAction
    Enum describing different actions to take upon validation.
  • Classes in org.jsapar.error used by org.jsapar.compose.string

  • Classes in org.jsapar.error used by org.jsapar.error 
    Class and Description
    ErrorEvent
    The event that is fired in any of the implementations of ParseTask, Composer or ConvertTask in case an error occured.
    ErrorEventListener
    Interface for receiving event call-backs while parsing or composing.
    JSaParException
    Base class for all types of errors that can be added to an ErrorEvent
    RecordingErrorEventListener
    Records all errors into a list of errors that can be retrieved with the method RecordingErrorEventListener.getErrors() later.
    ValidationAction
    Enum describing different actions to take upon validation.
